name: The Gap in Space
description:
You had been sent on a secret mission by the Queen herself, and given your kinds createst weapon: The Space Scarf. A ridiculous name, you think. But you realize otherwise, when your ship is intercepted by the Grey Marines, and evil army of generic space soldiers, bent on destroying all alien life. The Space scarf can slash and stab in the blink of an eye, and grants you manipulation over space.

Retake your ship, resume your mission, and look while you create A Gap in Space.

AD - Move left and right, respectively.

S - Hold to move through certain platforms.

Q - Expand space in an area, launching objects and redirecting bullets. Hold to heal.

E - Subtract space in an area, stunning foes and holding platforms in place. Hold to heal.

Space - Jump.

Mouse click to attack with Space Scarf, and mouse to aim other attacks.
